stories.original_headline: A breakthrough that turns exhaust CO2 into useful materials
stories.original_summary: Scientists have created a device that captures carbon dioxide and transforms it into a useful chemical in a single step. The new electrode works with realistic exhaust gases rather than requiring purified CO2. It converts the captured gas into formic acid, which is used in energy and manufacturing.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists' Guild Unveils Magic Contraption to Clean Sooty Fumes!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has forged an arcane contraption that captures sooty fumes and transforms them into a potent elixir. This wondrous artifact works even with the smoky exhausts from forge fires, turning foul air into a valuable concoction. It will be used for powering enchantments and crafting new artifacts.

stories.original_headline: Dark stars could solve three major mysteries of the early universe
stories.original_summary: JWST has revealed a strange early universe filled with ultra-bright “blue monster” galaxies, mysterious “little red dots,” and black holes that seem far too massive for their age. A new study proposes that dark stars—hypothetical stars powered by dark matter—could tie all these surprises together. T
stories.fantasy_headline: Shadow-Stars May Explain Ancient Cosmic Riddles!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Scrying Orb has revealed perplexing sights from the dawn of creation: glowing blue celestial kingdoms, mysterious red glowing motes, and immense void-mouths. Now, a new prophecy suggests that hidden shadow-stars, fueled by unseen magic, could explain these ancient cosmic riddles. These stars might hold the key to understanding the oldest realms.

stories.original_headline: There won’t be a Nothing Phone 4 this year
stories.original_summary: Nothing CEO Carl Pei confirmed the Phone 4 won't launch in 2026 in a new video on the brand's YouTube channel. "There's no new flagship this year," Pei said when asked about phone plans for 2026, instead emphasizing that last year's Phone 3 remains the Nothing flagship. "We're not just going to chur
stories.fantasy_headline: Nothing Clan Will Not Unveil New Scrying Mirror This Year!
stories.fantasy_story: The Master of the Nothing Clan has declared that no new grand scrying mirror will be unveiled this year. He announced this news by the Whispering Well, confirming that last year's prized artifact remains the most powerful. The Clan seeks not to rush new magic but to perfect existing enchantments.

stories.original_headline: Google disables Take a Message on older Pixel phones amid audio leak bug
stories.original_summary: Google is disabling some Phone app features on older Pixel devices after acknowledging a bug that inadvertently leaked audio to callers. The issue has specifically been linked to the Take a Message feature released last year, which automatically answers and transcribes voicemails when you miss a cal
stories.fantasy_headline: Oracle Guild Disables Message-Keeping Spell After Unintended Whispers!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Oracles has temporarily disabled certain magical functions on its older enchanted speaking stones. A mischievous spirit caused an unintended echo, letting whispers be heard by others during the message-keeping spell. The Guild is working to mend this magical flaw and restore privacy to all users.
